items.sentence: Do you really think it\'ll be easy to do that?
Have you noticed anything out of the ordinary?
Have you reported that your father is missing?
Tom is rich, so money isn\'t really a problem.
I don\'t think Tom has time today to help you.
Tom asked me whether I wanted sugar in my tea.
Tom carries a harmonica with him all the time.
Tom carries a harmonica with him at all times.
Tom was released from the hospital last month.
Tom said that he didn\'t want to speak French.
